benchmark_details.name: Design2Code
benchmark_details.overview: Design2Code is the first real-world benchmark for multimodal code generation from visual designs, containing 484 diverse real-world webpages as test cases and automatic evaluation metrics to assess model performance.
benchmark_details.data_type: HTML/CSS code generation from visual design inputs

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark the capabilities of multimodal large language models in generating functional code from visual webpage designs.

data.source: Real-world webpages curated from the C4 validation set
data.annotation: Manually curated and filtered for quality

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on visual similarity and element matching between generated and reference webpages.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment to the reference webpages in terms of layout and visual fidelity.
methodology.baseline_results: Various state-of-the-art models including GPT-4o and Claude 3 for comparison.
methodology.validation: Human evaluations confirmed the effectiveness of automated metrics.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Filtered out webpages containing private or sensitive information during curation.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Dataset is released under ODC-By license.
